extDescription.message: Converts Japanese/English text to the Wingdings font.

popupInputPlaceholder.message: Enter text to convert here (max 666 chars)
popupInputPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the main input textarea.

popupMappingButton.description: Label for the mapping table button.

popupResultLabel.description: Label for the conversion result area.

popupReverseTitle.description: Title for the reverse conversion section.

popupReversePlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the reverse conversion textarea.

popupReverseButton.description: Label for the reverse convert button.

popupReverseResultLabel.description: Label for the reverse conversion result area.

popupPageActionsTitle.description: Title for the page actions section.

popupConvertPageButton.description: Label for the convert page button.

popupRevertPageButton.description: Label for the revert page button.

popupDictionaryTitle.description: Title for the personal dictionary section.

popupDictionaryManageButton.description: Label for the dictionary management button.

promptForReading.message: Please enter the reading (in Hiragana) for "$kanji$":
promptForReading.description: Prompt message for user to enter the reading of a word.

alertWordAdded.description: Alert message shown when a word is successfully added to the dictionary.

alertAddWordFailed.message: Failed to add word to dictionary: $error$
alertAddWordFailed.description: Alert message shown when adding a word to the dictionary fails.

alertAddWordError.message: An error occurred while adding the word.
alertAddWordError.description: Generic error message for when an exception occurs while adding a word.
